homepage.heroSubtitle: Discover amazing recipes, share your culinary creations, and stay updated with our delicious newsletters. Join a community of passionate home cooks and professional chefs.
homepage.featuresSubtitle: Everything you need to elevate your cooking journey
homepage.recipeCollectionDesc: Thousands of recipes from home cooks and professional chefs, all with detailed ingredients and step-by-step instructions.
homepage.culinaryNewslettersDesc: Stay updated with the latest food trends, cooking tips, and seasonal recipes delivered right to your inbox.
homepage.communityDrivenDesc: Join a vibrant community where everyone can share their favorite recipes and culinary discoveries.
homepage.featuredRecipesSubtitle: Discover amazing dishes that our community loves
homepage.recentNewslettersSubtitle: Stay informed with the latest culinary insights and trends

newsletters.title: Newsletter Articles
newsletters.subtitle: Discover inspiring cooking stories, tips, and insights from our community
newsletters.noArticlesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or create the first article!
newsletters.demoNotice: Real Articles from Our Community! These are actual articles shared by users like you. Even though some are marked as demos, they are completely real and informative content.
newsletters.authorBio: is a passionate food writer and recipe developer who believes in the power of good food to bring people together. With years of experience in professional kitchens and food journalism, they share insights that make cooking accessible and enjoyable for everyone.
newsletters.getLatestRecipes: Get the latest recipes and cooking tips delivered to your inbox.

recipes.title: Recipe Collection
recipes.subtitle: Discover delicious recipes from our community of passionate cooks
recipes.noRecipesDescription: Try adjusting your search or filters, or create the first recipe!

content.joinCommunity: Join thousands of food enthusiasts who share and discover amazing recipes every day.
content.editorialTransparencyText: This recipe was originally published on {createdDate} and last modified on {updatedDate}. All modifications are tracked to maintain culinary integrity and proper attribution.

recipes.discoverRecipes: Discover amazing recipes shared by our community of passionate cooks and chefs
recipes.createYourTakeDescription: Want to modify this recipe with your own twist? Create your own version while giving credit to the original creator.
recipes.demoRecipeDescription: This is a demo recipe showcasing our platform features. However, it's a **real, tested recipe** with accurate ingredients and instructions that you can follow to create this dish!
recipes.realRecipesBanner: Real Recipes from Our Community! These are actual recipes shared by users like you. Even though some are marked as demos, they are completely real and followable recipes.

account.allSettingsOff: All settings off by default for privacy
account.allowPhotosLocation: Allow photos to include where they were taken
account.keepCameraSettings: Keep camera settings for photography enthusiasts
account.keepOriginalDateTime: Keep original date and time information
account.includeDeviceInfo: Include which device took the photo
account.photoSettingsDescription: These settings let you choose what information to keep in your photos. By default, all settings are off for maximum privacy, but you can enable them to preserve camera settings, location context, and more. Your choices are saved and will apply to all future photo uploads.
account.tryAdjustingSearch: Try adjusting your search or filters, or

create.chooseContribution: Whether you have an amazing recipe to share or culinary insights to publish, choose how you'd like to contribute to our community.
create.addFavoriteRecipe: Add your favorite recipe with ingredients, instructions, and cooking tips.
create.uploadPhotos: Upload photos of your dish and ingredients
create.setDifficulty: Set difficulty level and cooking time
create.shareCulinaryInsights: Share culinary insights, cooking tips, and food trends with the community.
create.richTextEditor: Rich text editor with formatting options
create.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your recipe, its origins, and what makes it special...
create.originalCreatorPlaceholder: e.g., Julia Child, Traditional Italian cuisine

legal.acceptanceText: By accessing and using Cooking With ("the Platform"), you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.
legal.descriptionText: Cooking With is a community-driven platform where users can share, discover, and explore recipes and culinary content. Our platform provides tools for recipe creation, editing, rating, and community interaction.
legal.recipeAttributionText: When sharing recipes, users must properly attribute original creators and respect culinary heritage. Our platform maintains editorial transparency by tracking original publication dates and modifications.
legal.contentOwnershipText: Users retain ownership of their original content but grant Cooking With a license to display, distribute, and promote their recipes and articles on the platform.
legal.recipeAccuracy: Ensuring recipe accuracy and food safety
legal.properAttribution: Providing proper attribution for traditional or adapted recipes
legal.noHarmfulContent: Not sharing harmful, offensive, or inappropriate content
legal.privacyText: We are committed to protecting your privacy. All uploaded images are automatically processed to remove location data and metadata. For full details, see our Privacy Policy.
legal.accountManagementText: Users can edit and delete their own content at any time. We maintain transparent modification tracking to preserve culinary integrity and proper attribution.
legal.noHarmfulRecipes: Share recipes that may cause harm if followed
legal.noMisrepresentation: Misrepresent the origin or cultural significance of dishes
legal.noSpam: Engage in spam, harassment, or abusive behavior
legal.noUnauthorizedAccess: Attempt to access other users' accounts or data
legal.contentModerationText: Cooking With reserves the right to review, moderate, and remove content that violates these terms. We strive to maintain a respectful and educational culinary community.
legal.culinaryHeritageText: We respect the cultural origins of recipes and encourage users to acknowledge traditional sources, regional variations, and historical context when sharing dishes from various culinary traditions.
legal.limitationText: Cooking With is not responsible for the accuracy of user-submitted recipes or any consequences of following them. Users cook at their own risk and should use judgment regarding food safety and allergies.
legal.modificationsText: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated date. Continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of modified terms.
legal.contactText: For questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us:
legal.governingLawText: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws. Any disputes shall be resolved through appropriate legal channels.
legal.acknowledgment: By using Cooking With, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service.
legal.privacyCommitmentText: Cooking With is designed with privacy first. We automatically strip location data from all images, collect only essential information, and never sell your personal data.
legal.accountInfoText: When you create an account, we collect:
legal.emailAddress: Email address (for account access and notifications)
legal.images: Images (automatically processed for privacy - see section 3)
legal.usageAnalyticsText: We collect basic, non-personal usage statistics to improve the platform:
legal.noRealName: ‚ùå Your real name (unless you choose to share it)
legal.allUploadedImages: All uploaded images are automatically processed to remove:
legal.automaticProcessing: This happens automatically before your image is stored, ensuring your privacy is protected.
legal.weUseInformationFor: We use your information only for:
legal.providingPlatform: Providing and improving the cooking platform
legal.sharingRecipes: Enabling you to share and discover recipes
legal.platformSecurity: Maintaining platform security and preventing abuse
legal.preservingAttribution: Preserving culinary attribution and recipe history
legal.publicRecipes: Your public recipes and articles (as intended by the platform)
legal.usernameOnContent: Your username on content you create
legal.aggregatedStats: Aggregated, anonymous usage statistics for platform improvement
legal.usagePatterns: Usage patterns linked to your identity
legal.personalDataWithAdvertisers: Any personal data with advertisers or third parties
legal.secureDatabase: Secure database storage with access controls
legal.limitedAccess: Limited employee access on a need-to-know basis
legal.editDeleteContent: Edit or delete your recipes and articles at any time
legal.dataDeletionText: You can delete your account and all associated data at any time through your account settings. Upon deletion, we remove all personal information while preserving anonymous recipe contributions to maintain the community knowledge base.
legal.weUseMinimalCookies: We use minimal, essential cookies for:
legal.noTrackingCookies: We do not use tracking cookies for advertising or share data with ad networks.
legal.childrensPrivacyText: Our platform is designed for general audiences. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe a child has provided personal information, please contact us to have it removed.
legal.internationalUsersText: By using Cooking With, you consent to the transfer and processing of your information in accordance with this privacy policy, regardless of your location.
legal.changesToPrivacyText: We will notify users of material changes to this privacy policy by posting updates on this page and updating the "last modified" date. Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes.
legal.questionsAboutPrivacy: Questions about privacy or data handling?
legal.useContactForm: Use the contact form in your account dashboard
legal.summaryText: Cooking With is built on the principle that sharing recipes shouldn't compromise your privacy. We collect only what's necessary, protect what we have, and give you full control over your data. Your location, personal details, and browsing habits stay private.

auth.signInToContinue: Sign in to your account to continue sharing and discovering amazing recipes

auth.emailVerificationFailed: Email verification failed. Please try again or contact support.
